GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.4.211
GSD.description:
net: dsa: mv88e6060: prevent crash on an unused port

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit cb1753bc689c7a7f94da6eee7efc1ae6d8abb36c, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 0abfd494deefdbab66ac03c1181a614285e7d90c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: dsa: mv88e6060: prevent crash on an unused port
